duties_responsibilities.duty: Cultivate and develop relationships with valuable clients to ensure sales targets are exceeded and contribute to growth.
Engage and promote customer loyalty through a variety of engagement and selling activities in collaboration with teams.
Assist by nurturing existing clients, reactivating lapsed clients, and developing personal relationships with new prospects.
Organize and host client engagement activities within the NYC Metro area.
Work with the CEO on planning activities, tracking results, and identifying new business opportunities.
Attend exclusive brand events to aid business development and act as a brand ambassador.

education_certification.credential: Fashion or Business related education is preferred.
